login.title: Login or Register
login.emailLoginMessage: You can register, and login by using a link sent to you with email. Please note we use Google Firebase Authentication, and do store your account details in Google Public Cloud (EU sites, where possible)
login.message: Alternatively, you can use single sign on with the services below
